# CHIIDS Frontend - React + Vite Project Setup

## Project Overview
Building a custom React frontend for CHIIDS Meta-Project Explorer that queries Datasette JSON API.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Specifications
- **Framework:** React 18 + Vite
- **Styling:** TailwindCSS
- **Routing:** React Router v6
- **Data Source:** Datasette JSON API (http://localhost:8001)
- **Key Features:**
  - Project list with search
  - Filters (domain, type, status)
  - Project detail pages
  - Dependency graph visualization
  - Responsive design

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- Vite 5
- TailwindCSS 3
- React Router DOM 6
- Recharts (for dependency graphs)
- Fetch API for data

- Use current directory: `/Users/davidsmith/Dropbox (Personal)/GitHub/META-CHIIDS`
